moves.name: Race You!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Raises the user’s critical-hit rate.

moves.name: Solar Beam
moves.effect: The user gets ready to attack. Using this move again will cause the user to attack. No other actions can be taken while ready to attack. The preparation period is skipped if the weather is sunny, and the user can attack right away.

passives.name: Antitoxin
passives.description: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned or badly poisoned.

passives.name: Critical Strike 1
passives.description: Powers up attacks if they become critical hits.

passives.name: Agile Entry 1
passives.description: Raises the user’s evasiveness when the Pokémon enters a battle.
